definitions.definition: Doctrine , philosophy , body of beliefs or principles belonging to an individual or group.
examples: A dictatorship bans things, that do not conform to its ideology , to secure its reign.

definitions.definition: The study of the origin and nature of ideas.

main_definition: Doctrine , philosophy , body of beliefs or principles belonging to an individual or group.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The study of the origin and nature of ideas.
